mapper.insert: insert into material_and_chapter(id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, material_id, chapter_id, unit_id) values (#{id},now(),now(),null,#{materialId},#{chapterId},#{unitId})
mapper.select: select id,material_id,chapter_id,unit_id from material_and_chapter where deleted_at is null and chapter_id = #{chapterId} limit #{offset},#{limit}
select id,material_id,chapter_id,unit_id from material_and_chapter where deleted_at is null and unit_id = #{unitId} limit #{offset},#{limit}
select count(*) from material_and_chapter where deleted_at is null and chapter_id=#{chapterId}
select count(*) from material_and_chapter where deleted_at is null and unit_id=#{unitId}
mapper.update: update material_and_chapter set updated_at=now(), chapter_id = #{chapterId},unit_id=#{unitId} where material_id=#{materialId}
update material_and_chapter set deleted_at = now() where material_id =#{materialId}
